On Thu, Mar 13, 2025 at 1:44 PM Madeleine Saville <
madeleine.saville@littlescribblers.com.au> wrote:

Hi Andy,

I hope you're well

We've received a phone enquiry from a parent who has submitted the online
enquiry form twice but hasn’t received a response. I’ve checked the email
inbox linked to the webform (*enrol@littlescribblers.com.au*) and
couldn’t find any record of either submission.

Could you please urgently investigate this possible disconnection? If you
need any further details, feel free to reach out to me at *0475 738 243*.

Appreciate your help!

Best,
Madeleine Saville

wrote:

> Good Morning Jackie,
>
> I just tried to call you to run through the below - thank you for your
> patience.
>
> *1. Form updates - done :)*
>
> Firstly, let me say that the new form is up and running. If you click the
> enquire buttons throughout the site, you will see the shortened form. We
> have kept the old layout there, just hidden from the public for now. Can
> you please confirm that we are sending the form submissions to the correct
> email addresses? It's currently set up like this:
>
> *enrol@littlescribblers.com.au <enrol@littlescribblers.com.au>:*
>
> - Ashfield

> *sutherlandsupervisor@littlescribblers.com.au
> <sutherlandsupervisor@littlescribblers.com.au>*
>
> - Sutherland
>
> *2. Account Management:*
>
> I mentioned to Madeleine yesterday about our New Director, Andy Crebar,
> cc'd in. I can't recall if I mentioned this to you. I was quite focused on
> the issue at hand, so it may have escaped me.
>
> Some background context, ahead of our official communications due to be
> sent out in the coming days/week(s). Andy has joined Wolf IQ as our new
> Director, or 'Leader of the Pack' as the team has coined him. Andy will be
> heading up all of our client-facing communications with the team. I will be
> taking on a more behind the scenes roll. Andy has an incredible amount of
> experience and will be growing our service offering and team accordingly.
>
> All of my emails and phone calls are now being directed to Andy so that
> he can take action or forward on the requests. Needless to say, it appears
> that this has resulted in a delay for Little Scribblers. So please accept
> mine and Andy's apology. The changes at our side of things are vast as we
> wade through a decade of client account management from my end. But, of
> course, this should not affect our clients.
>
> Moving forward, you can send all requests to Andy and cc me in. Andy is
> also manning my old mobile number and our main line: 1300 072 134. However,
> if you are ever stuck and can't reach Andy, my personal mobile number is *0466
> 832 740. *I'll be able to jump in and help for urgent needs. Just don't
> share my number around please haha.
>
> I'm standing by if any updates are required on the new form. Please call
> me or SMS as I won't be at my computer.
>
> Again, thanks for your understanding.
>
> Heath
>
>
